text.more: This is based on a 2020 survey of 388 Math for America teachers, who named other teachers who influenced their pedagogy. Edges across schools are more interesting for analysis, as they contribute to the mission of Math for America to create a community of teachers across schools within NYC.
text.intro: Social Network Analysis of 388 Math for America teachers. Nodes are colored by subject (red = mathematics, blue = science, green = computer science). Edges are colored by whether they were within the same school or across schools (black = within school, purple = across school)
text.title: Survey Results Between Teachers
